summary: This document is an email chain from August 12-13, 2019, discussing the reassignment and administrative leave of staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in the immediate aftermath of Jeffrey Epstein's death. It shows internal planning and concern for staff well-being.

persons.name: Ray Ormond
persons.role: Staff member planning to visit MCC
persons.context: He plans to be at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) at 9am to visit with staff and go to the Special Housing Unit (SHU). He mentions having his cell phone with him.

events.title: Planned Staff Visit to MCC
events.description: Ray Ormond plans to visit staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) and go to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at 9am.

events.title: Meeting with Attorney General
events.description: A meeting with the Attorney General (AG) is scheduled for tomorrow, with a final decision pending on an unspecified matter.

keyFacts: The email chain is dated August 12-13, 2019, immediately following Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
Discusses staff reassignment and administrative leave at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), indicating internal turmoil.
References a pending final decision awaiting a meeting with the Attorney General, suggesting high-level involvement.
Mentions a prepared statement, indicating the action (likely related to Epstein's death) was expected to be public.
Shows coordination to check for official notices or postings related to the incident.
